GSD.description:
dm raid: fix address sanitizer warning in raid_resume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 2a9faa704d83ff0b04387e385efd8ae21cd95af6. For more details please see the references link.
